FuncDef: The display isis purge-source-trace analysis-report command displays information about definitely and possibly faulty nodes identified by IS-IS purge LSP source tracing. The display isis purge-source-trace analysis-report command displays information about definitely and possibly faulty nodes identified by IS-IS purge LSP source tracing.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an IS-IS process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays information about definitely and possibly faulty Level-1 nodes identified by IS-IS purge LSP source tracing.
-

Displays information about definitely and possibly faulty Level-2 nodes identified by IS-IS purge LSP source tracing.
-

ExtraInfo: To check information about definitely and possibly faulty nodes identified by IS-IS purge LSP source tracing, run the display isis purge-source-trace analysis-report command. The identified definitely and possibly faulty nodes are displayed in descending order in the command output, which helps maintenance personnel locate the faulty nodes and isolate them in time.
